SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.title: Registration in VK Ads
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step1_part1: 1. You need to log in to the system
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step2: 2. After logging in via VK ID, you are offered to create a new account or use the my target advertising account. You need to select "Create a new account".
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step3: 3. In the registration form that opens, where the correct parameters are already automatically selected, you need to fill in your mail.
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step5: 5. You will receive a letter confirming registration to the specified mail, where you will need to confirm it.
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step6: 6. In the created profile, go to "Settings", in the main settings your id will be indicated.
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.step7: 7. Copy this id and paste it into the ID field in the ADSWallet Personal Account to create a new advertising account.
SCREEN_CREATE_VK_ADS_ACCOUNT.prerequisite: You can only add a new ad account, without campaigns and with a zero balance!

SCREEN_CREATE_MY_TARGET_ACCOUNT.title: Registration in MyTarget
SCREEN_CREATE_MY_TARGET_ACCOUNT.step1: To register an advertiser's account with MyTarget, you need to go to the website
SCREEN_CREATE_MY_TARGET_ACCOUNT.step2: In the window that opens, log in through one of the presented social networks or register a new login by e-mail or phone number.
SCREEN_CREATE_MY_TARGET_ACCOUNT.step3: Next, you will be taken to the ad account registration page:
SCREEN_CREATE_MY_TARGET_ACCOUNT.decsription:
1. Select the interface language – "Russian (RU)"
2. Select the country "Russia"
3. Select the "Advertiser" client account type
4. Select the currency on the "Russian ruble" interface
5. Select the legal status "Individual"
6. If necessary, provide an email address
7. Read the terms of the offer and check the box
8.Click on the "Complete registration" button
